Reference: "Wu, Z., Song, S., Khosla, A., Yu, F., Zhang, L., Tang, X., & Xiao, J. (2015). 3d shapenets: A deep representation for volumetric shapes. In Proceedings of the IEEE conference on computer vision and pattern recognition (pp. 1912-1920)."
Application: 3D Point Cloud Classification; 3D Object Classification; 3D Object Recognition; 3D Point Cloud Data Augmentation; 3D Object Retrieval
Sensor Modality/Data Format: 3D CAD models from CAD model websites

Reference: "Caesar, H., Bankiti, V., Lang, A. H., Vora, S., Liong, V. E., Xu, Q., ... & Beijbom, O. (2020). nuscenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving. In Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF conference on computer vision and pattern recognition (pp. 11621-11631)."
Application: autonomous driving; 3D Object Detection; Instance Segmentation; 3D Semantic Segmentation; Trajectory Prediction; 3D Multi-Object Tracking; Trajectory Planing; Motion Detection
Sensor Modality/Data Format: 6 cameras; 5 radars and 1 lidar; all with full 360 degree field of view
Classes: e.g.  animal; debris; ambulance; police; barrier; bicycle; car; motorcycle; adult; child; police_officer; stroller; wheelchair; trafficcone; trailer; truck

Reference: "Armeni, I., Sener, O., Zamir, A. R., Jiang, H., Brilakis, I., Fischer, M., & Savarese, S. (2016). 3d semantic parsing of large-scale indoor spaces. In Proceedings of the IEEE conference on computer vision and pattern recognition (pp. 1534-1543)."
Application: 3D Semantic Segmentation; 3D Object Detection; 3D Panoptic Segmentation; 3D Instance Segmentation
Sensor Modality/Data Format: colored point cloud (Matterport scanner); RGB-D images
Dataset Size: 6 indoor areas, 271 rooms,  6020 m2, over 215 million points
Ground Truth: 3D semantic annotations; projected to the RGB-D images
Classes: ceiling; floor; wall; beam; column; window; door; table; chair; sofa; bookcase and board

Reference: "Chang, A. X., Funkhouser, T., Guibas, L., Hanrahan, P., Huang, Q., Li, Z., ... & Yu, F. (2015). Shapenet: An information-rich 3d model repository. arXiv preprint arXiv:1512.03012."
Application: 3D Semantic Segmentation; 3D Reconstruction; 3D Part Segmentation; Novel View Synthesis; Point Cloud Generation; Point Cloud Completion
Sensor Modality/Data Format: raw 3D model data  from public online repositories and existing research datasets
Ground Truth: Geometric Annotations (Rigid Alignments; Parts and Keypoints; Symmetry; Object Size); Functional annotations (Functional Parts; Affordances); Physical Annotations (Surface Material; Weight)
